Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Milwaukee in 2022...
Injured on 6/14/2022 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Milwaukee to Philadelphia on 2/1/2023 (Going to MIL: CF Joc Pederson, SS Brad Miller, P Osvaldo Benero. Going to PHI: 2B Peter Hill)...
Had first career hit on 9/22/2026, off Williams Stollings (LAD)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/6/2027, off Steven Gilbertson (NYY)...
Drove in 9 runs against Miami on 9/20/2027...
Traded from Philadelphia to Tampa Bay on 1/31/2029 (Going to PHI: P Allen Quigley, P Vincent Nebeker. Going to TB: 2B Peter Hill, LF Theodore Stradley)...
Won World Series with Tampa Bay in 2029...
1/31/2030: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,279,286 through salary arbitration...
